Package com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.veterinarian

Class VeterinarianService

java.lang.Object
com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.veterinarian.VeterinarianService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IVeterinarianService
@Service public class VeterinarianService extends Object implements IVeterinarianService
Service layer for managing operations related to veterinarians. Provides functionality to fetch, aggregate, and validate veterinarians and their appointments.

  • Method Details

    • getAllVeterinariansWithDetails

      @Cacheable("veterinarians_with_details") public List<UserDto> getAllVeterinariansWithDetails()
      Retrieves a list of all enabled veterinarians with detailed information. This method fetches veterinarians with the user type "VET" and isEnabled status set to true, then maps them to UserDto objects. During the mapping process, additional details such as average rating and total number of reviews for each veterinarian are included.

      The method leverages caching to store the resulting list of enabled veterinarians for faster subsequent access. Caching is controlled by the Cacheable annotation, where the cache key is "veterinarians_with_details".

      Cache details:

      • Cache name: "veterinarians_with_details"
      • Cache entry is skipped if the result is null or empty.
      Specified by:
      getAllVeterinariansWithDetails in interface IVeterinarianService
      Returns:
      a list of UserDto representing enabled veterinarians with detailed information, including their average ratings and total review counts.

    • getVeterinarianWithDetailsAndReview

      public UserDto getVeterinarianWithDetailsAndReview(Long vetId)
      Retrieves a veterinarian's details along with their photo and reviews.

      This method:

      • Fetches a veterinarian by their ID, including their photo.
      • Throws an exception if the veterinarian is not found.
      • Converts the veterinarian entity into a UserDto.
      • Populates the DTO with review details, including average rating and total reviews.
      Specified by:
      getVeterinarianWithDetailsAndReview in interface IVeterinarianService
      Parameters:
      vetId - the ID of the veterinarian.
      Returns:
      the UserDto containing veterinarian details, photo, and reviews.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the veterinarian is not found.

    • getSpecializations

      @Cacheable("specializations") public List<String> getSpecializations()
      Retrieves all available specializations for veterinarians. This method fetches a list of unique specialization names from the database by querying the VeterinarianRepository.

      The method leverages caching to improve performance by storing the result under the cache name "specializations". This reduces database queries for subsequent calls.

      Cache details:

      • Cache name: "specializations"
      • Cache entry is skipped if the result is null or empty.
      Specified by:
      getSpecializations in interface IVeterinarianService
      Returns:
      a List of String representing all unique specializations available for veterinarians. The list is empty if no specializations are found.

    • findAvailableVeterinariansForAppointments

      public List<UserDto> findAvailableVeterinariansForAppointments(String specialization, LocalDate date, LocalTime time)
      Finds available veterinarians based on specialization, date, and time.
      Specified by:
      findAvailableVeterinariansForAppointments in interface IVeterinarianService
      Parameters:
      specialization - the specialization to filter veterinarians.
      date - the date for the appointment.
      time - the time for the appointment.
      Returns:
      a list of UserDto representing available veterinarians.

    • aggregateVetsBySpecialization

      public List<Map<String,Object>> aggregateVetsBySpecialization()
      Aggregates veterinarians by their specialization.
      Specified by:
      aggregateVetsBySpecialization in interface IVeterinarianService
      Returns:
      a list of maps containing specialization and veterinarian count.

    • getAvailableTimeForBookAppointment

      public List<LocalTime> getAvailableTimeForBookAppointment(Long vetId, LocalDate date)
      Retrieves available times for booking an appointment with a veterinarian on a specific date.
      Specified by:
      getAvailableTimeForBookAppointment in interface IVeterinarianService
      Parameters:
      vetId - the veterinarian's ID.
      date - the date to check availability.
      Returns:
      a list of LocalTime representing available time slots.
